Taste_this24,

I myself "prefer" white models when it comes to fapping material.  Most of the models in my collection are white.  I also prefer hairy women.  From time to time, though, I like shaved models, and black models.  That's because real sex appeal transcends race.  Models of any race can be stunning, or repulsive.  Even then, it's all relative.
